modName: Unofficial Fur Hoods HD Custom Race Patch
summary: A little Patch for Northborn\'s \"Fur Hoods HD\" Mod. This should enable the hoods to all Custom races.
descriptionHtml:
Northborn\'s mod \"Fur Hoods HD\" was incompatible with Custom Races due to a minor mistake with the models. 
I corrected this Problem and made his great mod compatible with all custom races :)

All credits for the Fur Hoods HD mod goes to Northborn - i just made that little patch because it annoyed me that my characters couldn\'t use his hoods.

[u][b]Original Mod:[/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3201]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3201[/url]

[u][b]Installation:[/u][/b]
Just drop the .esp in your data folder. Simply override the .esp from Northborns mod, it should work.

[u][b]Bugs/Problems:[/b][/u]
Always possible - Might overlooked an item or model, so tell me if it doesn\'t work.
Another note: I\'m using the HD version, means the one with 2048x2048 textures. I don\'t think it matters, but it\'s possible that it won\'t work with the 1024 or the 512 version. Feedback would be nice, so I can upload the other versions, if necessary.
author: Kadian
